doc:
Carol Coombs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carol_Coombs 0 Carol Coombs (born October 15, 1935) is a former Canadian-born American actress. She appeared in 24 films between 1941 and 1958, although mostly in minor roles. She is probably best-known as Janie Bailey, the oldest daughter of James Stewart and Donna Reed, in the 1946 film classic It's a Wonderful Life. In the 1950s, she also had roles in a number of television productions. Coombs retired from film business in her early twenties and spent the rest of her working life teaching kindergarten and elementary school. As of December 2014, the great-grandmother and her husband of 57 years, Chet Mueller, lived in Irvine, California. She often attends festivals and meetings dealing with It's a Wonderful Life. As of December_2014 , the_great-grandmother and her_husband of 57_years , Chet_Mueller , lived in Irvine , California . She often attends festivals_and_meetings dealing with It 's a_Wonderful_Life .
